alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:11PM EDT until July 08 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT FOR GADSDEN...CENTRAL LEON...SOUTHEASTERN DECATUR AND SOUTHWESTERN GRADY COUNTIES... At 809 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bainbridge to near Havana to 14 miles southwest of Midway, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Quincy, Midway, Havana, Tallahassee Community College, Gretna, Attapulgus, Lake Bradford, Freemont, Macon Community Park, Littman, Douglas City, Darsey, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Griffin Heights, Fred George Park, Laingkat and Calvary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
